a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: uwangesall mi lla temakesi. musabak i takakesian na sinsi. “karetigir driya! semungala ta!” kema na kemakedreng dra risarisan.

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: pakireb mi marengay dra, “sinsi, inabayan!”

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a temakakesi mi i, tu paladamaw mi kana sinsi temarapuyuma dra aaipan.

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: sagar mi semenay kay baelli na mainayan.

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: idriidriwan i nanalli. a ising i nanalli.

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: an kadru i ruma i namalli i, temarapuyuma kimadrayar kaniyam.

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: kurenang ku kana baelli muka kitabillaellaa.

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: sagar ku kantu kulisepa kan mulli na mainayan. imaran i!

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a karealliyan i, karaabel mi dra karealliyan kan mulli na babayan.

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: driyama, a kasedean dra kadenunan kandri na ami. kuyku aw i baelli na mainayan i, muruma mi i drekall kiyumaumall dra maidrangan. maranger mi malladram drata kakuwayanan.

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: makawalu lla tu ami kana maidrang. amawna, kamawan driya dra alabalabat an menau ta.

我今天七點到學校。: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像中年人。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: ku kiyumallay na maidrang dra, “a manamanay nu kinasaiguwan na ngaiyan?” salaw dalus an temarapuyuma. saigu driya temarapairang, temaraamis aw temaradripung.
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in puyuma, as well as Hokkien, Pangcah and Japanese.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他會哪些語言，他的卑南語說得很流利，也會說閩南語、阿美話和日本話。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: peniya ku kiyumall i, mukalladram ku lla. a makiteng driya na maidrang i, meladaladam temaradripung. aw a Amis tu kataguwin. tu llang kikarun i, a Pairairang. driyama, sadru tu kisaiguwan na ngaiyan.
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an Pangcah, and he knows many Hokkien at work, so he can speak so many languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就學日本話，太太是阿美族人，而他工作上認識許多閩南人，所以他會說這麼多語言。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a madradrayar mi kana maidrang i, benabati dra sadru dra kallalladrman kana bulletrenganan dratu kakuwayanan dra paallupan.
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: alla, adri mi maruwa paseket mukalladram dratu nirarengay i, ullaya naniyam lu-ing kana so-ci. karuwa mi driya masamasall paseket killengallengaw.
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a makiteng ku driya i, adri ku malladram drata kakuwayanan. salaw ku migela rarengay dra “a Yuēn-cu-min ku.” kema.
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: marekasadru ku kinalladraman i, pananaan ku lla a Piniyumayan kema ku kemiyanger. a salaw kirekamelli aw a paaillingan lla dra trau.
The more I know, the more I feel that being a Piniyumayan is unique and something to be proud of.
我今天七點到學校。: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為卑南族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: an karauraub i, uwaruma ku wadi na mainayan.
My younger brother is going home this evening.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: marenang mi kan emu na babayan muka i iciba tremimaa dra terekuk. aru aabel dra imaran dra kakerabian pangara kanku wadi na mainayan.
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給弟弟。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: melibat mi kana menaniwan dra kulang. sadru a mangangedean a kulakulang kana menaniwan dra kulang.
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了菜攤。菜攤有好多新鮮的青菜。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: tremima mi dra takungkung, dra tanuban aw dra ninzin.
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: na menaniwan dra kalimudan i saninin na lawpan i, “dallreu ku pangudrall aw ku lupas. trima dra samaya i!” kema.
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: tremima mi dra pangudrall aw dra lupas.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: melibat mi kana menaniwan dra patraka. “tratrima yu dra manay? ulalanean na terekuk garem. tuluwa leman na saya.” kema na lawpan.
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today's chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說：「你要買什麼？今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: padrangal lla dradru kema i emu na babayan. “karuwa yu melegetr dratu trima?” kema kiyumall kana lawpan.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: amawna, “madulu lla. adri ku karuwa melegetr.” kema na lawpan.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: na lawpan i saninin i, “alamu trima kananku kuraw. matrina aw madulu ku kuraw.” kema.
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說：「來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: likudran i, tremima mi dra terekuk aw dra kuraw. muruma mi i, abelaw a sadru a irupan.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: paetreng mi mengangara. aw aremeng lla na wari.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: padingwa ku wadi na mainayan dra, “padukeduk pakalladram dra adri karuwa semede na hitay. an masall kana kasedean i, uwaruma ku lla.” kema
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn't take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說:「軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: “sakuwadruwadru ku inabel na irupan. daullu ta trau aw mukasaya ta mekan i!” kema i emu na babayan.
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let's eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多：「叫大家一起來吃吧！」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: naiyam daullaw a nirumaenan druwa i urma. mukasakasa mi kerabi dra kalluba dra aekanan.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: ullaya ku risarisan a misasa. i Langutr tu ngalad. marayas abalu kemasu dra manay driya dar.
I have a classmate named Langutr, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Langutr，他常常忘記帶東西。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: an temakakesi ta dar i, kibulas kana risarisan dra tratruri, dra iyasaus. adri i, dra tatilillan.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: pariyasall, parepuwan, paretelun. tu pabulasay dra trau peniya.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次。大家會借東西給他。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: amawna, adri inaba tu kakuwayanan. an kibulas dra manay driya i, marayas dar adri parebabeliyas.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: likudran lla i, adri maranger pabulas dra manay driya a trau kantaw.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: ullaya a saya wari. sallangallangan mi paniya muka muwadrangiya.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a kadru mi driya i dalan i, maranger muka i puwatriyan i Langutr. amawna, abalu kemasu kana kadupu na aitrul.
On the way, Langutr wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Langutr想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: kibulas dra risarisan kana kadupu na aitrul i, tu tubangaw dra trau peniya dra, “adri ku kemasu i!”
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說：「我也沒有帶耶！」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: tu aleduan kan Langutr i, matrangis. salaw illemes aw, “daw adri mu muwai pabulas kanku kana kadupu na aitrul kema?
Langutr burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Langutr急的哭了出來。他生氣的說：「為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙？」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: tu babatiaw dra risarisan. amau yuyu na adri kemakasu. aw an kibulas yu dra manay driya i, adri yu parebabeliyas!
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: dra dadaman i, semaball muka i takasian i Langutr. tu kinibulasan na manay driya i, tu parebeliyasanay kana risarisan.
The next day at school, Langutr arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Langutr很早就到學校了，Langutr把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: semungal kana risarisan i Langutr aw, “igelayan! likudran i, kuykuya na kemasu dra manay driya.” “adru a kiyabulas ku kanemu i, mu pabulasay ku dra manay driya. semangalan kemaya ku driya kanemu.” kema.
Langutr apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Langutr向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a paaallup i namalli kadri drekall.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a makiteng ku driya. i namalli kay namalli na maranak i, mupatraran an aremeng dar. kemasu dra tadraw aw dra kuwang.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: an idenan i, mikinasuwan dratu pinaallupan na rawa muruma.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: an numa i, a babuy; an numa i, a nawan. an asuwa dar i, a anabang.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: an meredek kana salikidr i drekall nadru i, tu parepaniniaw na rawa lla. aw tu paninianay dra drinekallanan.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: marayas ku beningabinga kan namalli dra kuwarenangan muka paallupa.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: “an matrina yu lla i, ti pillangaw yu lla muka.” kema i namalli.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說：「等我長大了他再帶我一起去。」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: na mainayan i drekall i, mipetrir muka penetrira. saigu demaway kana petrir na sawail aw kana petrir na treellaw dra barasa nadru.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: saigu demaway kana petrir na sawail i namalli. a papetriran dra anabang kema. ta paseketay menaunau tu dinapallan kana rarawa. aw ta tekeranay kantu dalan kana rarawa na petrir.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: ku marangeran kurenang dra maidrang muka paallupa i, meladaladamm ku demaway dra petrir kana wawariwari aw palamu ku saigu. maruwa lla mitiyu dra rawa ku petrir.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: menau i namalli kemadri aw, “likudran i, kaamau yuyu na salaw makeser na miyaallup.” kema kanku.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說：「我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: matrina ku lla garem. ku alayanay ku bakenan aw ku papana. kurenang ku kan namalli muka paallupa.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: muruma mi i drekall i, naniyam sepadanay dra drinekallanan na rawa.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: “sasungal ta dra temuwamuwan dratu iyaalaw aw tu iyaberay. maruwa ta mitiyu dra sadru dra rawa.” kema i namalli.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說:「我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: puwari ku muka i takesian a semaluwan.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a mauka ku i takesian i, abalu ku kemasu dra kabang.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: adri ku kemasu dra mamanamanay.
I didn't bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a mungesalr mi temakesi i, mukasa ku kanku risarisan menau dra tilin.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a palralrimaw mi i, tu pabulasay ku dra tratruri aw dra iyasaus kanku risarisan.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: “sabasabalr maragan! adri lra kapuwaari!” kema na sinsi kanku.
The teacher told me, Wake up earlier next time and don't be late again!""
我今天七點到學校。: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了！」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: i Maywan tu ngalad kan ngidralri. tu walrak dra Pinuyumayan.
My good friend’s name is Maywan, and he is also an Pinuyuma child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫 Maywan，他也是卑南族的小孩。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: mukasa mi temakesi kana drekalr i Puyuma.
We study together in the Puyuma tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在普悠瑪部落讀書。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: marayas mi mukasa kilrangaw dra maaidrangan benabati dra batibatiyan. sayaiguan mi temarapuyuma.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Puyuma proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說卑南語。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: asatr ku aw ulane ku. adare aw idriidriwan i Maywan.
I am tall and overweight, while Maywan is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，Maywan很矮也很瘦。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: salikesik i Maywan. sagar a trau peniya kantaw.
Maywan is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Maywan很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: marepaukauka dra rarenadran i takesian an uninan. sadru a marepaukauka i takesian.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: ulraya a makedrekedreng dra tuwasu, a semalrepad dra mali, a muarak aw a penapana.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: maariari ku dra kabekas.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a kababekas ku i, malradu ku aw mudadamuk dra sadru ku sungal.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: maretigir ku aw patrutru ku kabekas.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 於是我站起來，繼續向前跑。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: palru ku kana papalruwan i, maysemangalan a trau peniya.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: adri ku mualak dra asanga. amawna, salaw ku semangal! ku pasekadraw ku kinurenangan na marepaukauka.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a daman i, marenang mi kan namalri muka kirepanauwa kan namalri na maranak.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: kurepanana tu dapalr kan namalri na maranak.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔的腳受傷了。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: “mibuwang tu saub kana ruma.” kema kaniyam i namalr na maranak.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a semaseket i, mutani kemay i sausaub taytaw.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: kemasu dratu patraka dra gung aw dra puran i namalri. tu berayay i namalri na maranak.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給叔叔。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: kadru mi i kiyaedrengan madradrayar kan namalri na maranak. benabati dra sadru dra batibatiyan.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和叔叔在房間裡聊天，他說了很多故事。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a muwaburek mi i, “asatr yu lra aw bangesar yu lra!” kema semakal kanku i namalri na maranak.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: “ama, an inaba lra nu dapalr i, alamu lra uwadrangi i ruma!” kema ku kan namalri na maranak.
I said, “When your foot gets better, come to our house next time and visit us.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我說：「等叔叔腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: kana 2022 amiyan i, madrayadrayar na ceng-vu dratu pakumauwan dra trau. karuwa lra putililr dratu ngalad na tinarainanuwayan kema.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: muka ku kiyumalra dra bangesaran i drekalr. i Insing Babutrulr i, paetreng lra tu kiniamiyan kana ceng-vu dra tatililran dratu ngalad na tinarainanuwayan kana pakumauwan dra trau.
I interviewed Insing Babutrulr, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Insing Babutrulr。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: marekakuret mi kandri na kasedean dra saliyusan. auka ku kantaw marekiumaumalra.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a marekiumaumalr mi i, tu babatiaw ku dra kemay isuwa aw tu pauwayan kantu ngalad. tu pilrangaw ku driya muka marekaladama kantu trau i sabak aw kantu drekalr.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他告訴我他的名字的由來和意義，也帶我認識了他的家人和他的部落。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: “daw merukedrang yu dra aasalran kanu ngalad? adri inaba tu itatililr kana pakanguwayan amaw?” kema ku kiyumalr kantaw.
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎？

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: “an temaralutiya i, adri maruwa penatedrelr pungalad kanku ngalad. ulraya driya a trau pungalad kanku dra {In-ciēn-seng}. aw mudaway a sadru a kasaeruwan.” kema kanku.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \In Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35677/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的稱呼的名字，其他人還會叫我「音先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: “na tinarainanuwayan temililr na ngalad i, pananaan lra dra naniyam ngalad. tatapes dra naniyam maunan, dra naniyam nirumaenan aw dra naniyam pakumauwan dra trau. maruwaya marekakadruwan na atrebung dratu kangaladan a nirumaenan.” kema i Insing Babutrulr.
Insing Babutrulr said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35677/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: Insing Babutrulr說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: a daman i, marenang mi kan mulri na babayan muka i iciba kana naniwanan meniwana. kemasu dra sadru dratu sinaleman na kulakulang i mulri na babayan. aw semanga driya dratu aekanan dra Inanuwayan a sasepadan dra trau.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: sagar a trau peniya dratu naniwanan kan mulri na babayan. kadruwan a trau tremima dra kamangulr aw dra tipatipayan. aw kadruwan a trau druwa temalrama dratu inabel na irupan.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and Slender Amaranth, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和野莧很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: tu sinangaan na binariyaw aw na bineraberas kan mulri na babayan i, salaw imaran. ulraya driya na terekuk na niringering dratu tralun kana kisiw. tu arelr kana aekanan i, kemedrekedreng dra kadruwan dra labang druwa muturika kaniyam naniwanan.
The Bamboo leaf migao and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶做的包葉粿和糯米飯非常好吃，還有用養生草炒的雞肉，美食的味道吸引了很多客人來我們攤位排隊。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: an demaderu dra aekanan i mulri na babayan i, kadru ku i saninin kiyatrebung dra labang. merukedrang ku patrirebeng dra, “na kulakulang i, naniyam sinaleman peniya. adri pinuka dra puwatremel. alamu! kamelamu trima a!”
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown
我今天七點到學校。: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35677/5: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: garemaremay i, niwananay lra peniya na manay driya. “amau nu pinulrangan a!” kema i mulri na babayan kanku.
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: idri na lremak na meniwan i, mukalradram ku lra dratu semaseberan dra Inanuwayan aw dra kasaiguwan dratu aekanan dra Inanuwayan. aw mitinalraman ku lra dratu ulepan kana naniwanan meniwan.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

a pitu waluwan i, muka ku i takesian a u: menau ku kan mulri na babayan dratu lubisan kana aekanan na bulretrenganan. salaw ku semangal aw maruwa ku pailring dra trau.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，我感到非常驕傲和榮幸。
